title: Never Tear Us Apart
lyrics:
Don't ask me
What you know is true
Don't have to tell you
Oh, I love your precious heart
I was standing

You were there

Two worlds collided

And they could never, ever, tear us apart oh



And we could live

For a thousand years

But if I hurt you

I'd make wine from your tears

I told you

That we could fly

'Cause we all have wings

But some of us don't know why



I was standing

You were there

Two worlds collided

And they could never, ever, tear us apart oh

And they could never, ever, tear us apart oh oh oh



I was standing

You were there

Two worlds collided

And they could never, ever, tear us apart

Tear us apart oh

And they could never, ever, tear us apart
